Room.Name: Turbulent Air
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a turbulent air stream, hanging on to a dragon. 50.n0.e0.s1.w2
Room.LongDescription: Toward the west is the Vallenda Pass, located between two great mountain ranges to the south and to the north. Much further to the west is the Vallenda Plains, a strange land where a great waste land exists. To the east there are several major villages and towns, and the city of Kista.
